# includesCategory(category)

**Instance Method**

A Boolean value that indicates whether to include a category from a search.

## Declaration

```swift
includesCategory(category: AddressCategory): boolean;
```

## Querying filter behavior

- **excludesCategory(category)**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to exclude a category from a search.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether to exclude a category from a search.
items.name: excludesCategory(category)
